Dialogue: Come one, come all!

We've the best
prices in the realm!

Any word
on the Empire?

Our scouts should
be returning shortly.

One day,
all this'll be mine!

The wood...
It's watching, you know!

You look odd. Did you do
something with your hair?

A little lanolin
goes a long way.
You can rest now.
Kweh! Kweeeh!

Well done. Report to
the Barracks at once.

It had to have
been the Ixal.

The markings
were consistent.

Allow me to assist
you, good sir.

I need to be back in
Limsa by sundown!

Where in the seven
hells is that woman?
Zzz...

Just what we need.
Another outsider...

Where in Oschon's name
are those damned Ixal?

Those are some
right fine birds.

The markets are
beyond this passage.
Kwaaark! Kwaaaaaark!

You can do it, girl!
Now push!

What if we were to
entreat the spirits?

Would you have your
mother wipe your arse?

<If(PlayerParameter(4))>Want to know how<Else/>Watch your eyes</If>
<If(PlayerParameter(4))>I got up here, do you?<Else/>now, milord.</If>

Respite cleanses the
mind of impurity.
Kweh! Kweh!
What is it, girl?
Ginger cookies are my sustenance!

Your words are my
sustenance, Master!

My whole body reeks
of gysahl greens!

But the forest was
once full with them!

Sorry, ma'am. We're
fresh out of walnuts.
Gods, me back!

Caps of red,
good as dead.
Caps of white,
stew tonight!

One cannot be too
careful when working
the saws.

A little off here,
and a little off here...

You're not supposed
to be back here, you!

A fine crop we'll
have this season!

I can make it,
I tell you! Just watch!

You're going to fall
in again.

Always heed the
spirits, my children.

But I can't heed
what I can't hear!

What I wouldn't give
for a cup of mead.

May the Matron bless
these busy bees.

Only a few more
turns of the sun now.

I told you, no
wandering off!
But, Mother!
Come one, come all!

We've the best
prices in the realm!

We mustn't let this
come between us!
I suppose...

All travelers are
welcome here. Even you.
Kweh...

Apologies, milord!
It won't happen again.

You'd best believe
it won't.
Damnable Duskwights!

Silence! You will
disturb the rites.

On your feet!
We're not through yet!

But my legs...
They're like jelly!
Die, foul Ixal!

Disobey me again, and it
will be another thousand!

Bend your knees!
Straighten your back!
Hyah!
Yes, sir!
Nnnghaaa! Grrraaah!

How much longer?
I grow weary of this.
Foul spirits, begone!

Well, I see nothing
wrong with her.

She's got the blight,
I tell ye!

Yes, I believe we'll
be needing more salt.

To slice or to pierce?
I cannot decide!

Are you two
even listening?
\\<groan>
My apologies...

Sun's sweet smile
and wind's cool breath,
both of these
I send thee...♪
What to plant next...

This season, I
switched formulae!

I knew the leaves
looked greener!

Beta works far
better than alpha!

The foreman still
watching? Damn...

I think you've had
enough rest today.

Just another
half bell, I swear!
What do you think!?

What did you go
and cuff me for?

Such is the will
of the forest.
But that's not right!

The girl's only seen
twelve summers!

Please... You must
do something...

The forest watches
over us all.

Would the spirits
bless me business?
We must make haste!

I'm going nowhere
until I've had a drink.
But we just arrived!

The beasts grow
bolder by the day!

What say the spirits
of the harvest?

Why has Gridania
forsaken us?

May your wounds
be healed.
Thank ye, milady!
Why, that's terrible!

Coeurls came and
ate all our chicks!

Ten onzes of flour,
four dragon peppers...

As are your
eyes, my love.

The mead here
is simply divine.

We can still be
friends, can't we?
I...er...suppose...so...
\\<yawn>

I say banish each
and every outsider!

The Seedseers say
we must accept them.
Leave me be...

Ain't a lady allowed
a moment's rest?

All in good time,
my friends.

We met our end of
the bargain!

You have your gil.
Now where is it?

Fish! Have you
lost your wits!?

Think of all the fish
this could carry!

Wench! We need
another round!

I could fit my
whole family in that!
What we need is another wench.
La lala la la!♪
Won't no one et ye on my watch, dear.

Must...be...careful...
not...to... Ouch!

The beans! I cannot rid
my clothes of this stench!

Everything seems
in order today.

What beautiful
craftsmanship!

Eh.
I've seen better.

I cannot sleep a wink
with that snoring!
\\<snore>

I cannot steady
my hands!

A tad higher... Or
perhaps a tad lower?

Relax... And do not
forget to breathe.

Wife tells me I'm
the best she's had.

Funny. She tells me
the same. Gahaha!

Haven't we trained
enough for the day?
\\<pant> \\<pant>

You think the enemy
will allow you rest!?
Yes, sir!
Yes, sir!

Yes, ma'am!
Ah! Sir!

You lot couldn't hit
the side of that log!

Is there naught you
can do to help!?
Kweeeh!

A hundred more until
you have it right!

That thrust won't
pierce the feathers
on an Ixal's arse!

My dearest
Pauline... Zzz......

It's them chigoes,
I tell you!

What would you
have me do then?
Kweh!

Then we agree
to disagree.
There, there.

Another bell and
we'll be in Gridania!

And then
we'll be rich!

That's if we make
it in one piece...
That's what you said last night.

Ugh... I've had my
last mead. I swear it.

The spirits will
never allow it!

Then we shall meet
the same fate...

Tread lightly, outsider.
I am watching you.

Gods! What is that
approaching!?

Join us in purging
the land of evil?

I think I found us
the perfect job!

Don't tell me...
Squirrels again?

I care not one whit for
your rules! I demand a room!
Coming right up, love!

The tallest mug of
your strongest ale!

Half a bell of rest, then
it's back to the barracks.
But I just sat down!

Ask an adamantoise.
I have none to spare.
Just one egg is all I ask!

Uh, Lady Heinana,
were we not in a hurry?

If there were only a way
to get them on their backs.

I will inquire with
the Fane about a
spell of levitation.

One can never be too
careful around tortoises.
Please. I can cut no more!

Very good. But what
of the delivery's status?

Ixal were sighted
near Eugenia's Spire.

You'd best let
your patrons know.
Master...

The fortress to the
north!? Are you mad?
We won't enter it; merely have a look.

Can't a man sleep off
his mead in peace?

Oh! I'm sorry, love. Were
you saying something?
I'll...uh, have some water.

Our specials today are
eel, eft, snail, and toad.
And I saw this outsider make off with the purse.

But that isn't true!
You must believe me!

Not two hours out of
Gridania, and look at you!

Sir, I'm ready for another
twenty malms, sir!

I had to chase a few of
the monsters away earlier.

These beans are covered
in opo-opo droppings!

You won't believe what
I have planned for today.

\\<sigh>
Here we go again.

Wait, let me guess.
Another trip to the ruins?

Damned vandals!
I'll never get this off!

Nothin' like a warm ale
after a day of maimin'!

See? I thought we
was 'ere to drink!

You wouldn't last
thirty heartbeats, dog.
Decisions, decisions...

Come, fight me on the
bloodsands like a man.

Cut the ropes to the
bridge, send the beast
plummeting, save the
princess.

Sounds simple enough.
What's in it for us?

Lookin' to borrow
some coin, maybe?

If only my
shift would end...

And what, exactly,
does action smell like?
You ready yet?

Just let me get a
good handle on her.

I'll get it right
next time, I swear!

Left! Right!
Keep moving!
Drawer 473.

This is hardly
what I'd call fair!

I have an idea for a
two-wheeled cart you
pedal with your legs.

One day, it'll be my
likeness on that wall!

Why wouldn't you
just ride a chocobo?

That last shipment
was full of impurities.

Took down three
opponents today, I did.

And not a single
scratch? Incredible!

How would you like to
take down one more...?

Calamities...
Cataclysms...
Ah, yes, catastrophes!

Kneel before Thal and
pray for safe passage
into the afterlife.

May the next life bring
me happiness...and gil.
Money is no object.

We wish to secure our
place in Thal's realm.

Will you lodge a com-
plaint with the guild?
Kweh!

Now let's see if we
can't get you cleaned up.
Today's matches are set!

Thrill awaits you
on the bloodsands!

Georg Galleongut!
He's my favorite!

One misstep and it's to
Stonesthrow with you!

In half a bell, she'll take
her break, and then I'll─

Your wife will
simply adore this!

I'll take a sack
of sunset wheat.

Making some bread
today? Or maybe ale?

Not if she learns
how much it costs...
There is nothing more beautiful than a woman with diamonds in her eyes and on her hands!

I've the finest gems
in all this fine town!

Now watch
and be amazed!
Look at her go!
I could do better...

I fell for a man
with no gil in his hand.♪

Now, how do I get me
one of those tails...?

And I only need dine
with him at his estate!

He'll truly buy you
any necklace you want?
Hey, you! Over here!

I just couldn't decide
between the red or the
blue...so I bought both!

For him, 200,000 gil! But
for you, my friend, only 25!
Any time now, dearest!

So which one did
you end up choosing?
I simply must have this vase!

Now where did I
put my lunch?

You will watch your
tongue whilst in the
Royal Promenade.

Lord Lolorito is naught
but a dirty old pinchgil!
A Fifth Astral Era copy of the Enchiridion!

Lower your voice! One
of his birds might hear!

You won't find another
outside the Holy See.

But your children
need their mother!

They say it was the
Flame General who
slew the mighty dragon.

He is a hero
amongst heroes.

You have excellent
taste, madam!
Why, thank you!

Will this take
very much longer?

We carry any weapon
you can imagine, and
more that you can't!

Custom embroidery
on all purchases!

One size fits all or
half your money back!

What if we increased
it to four tarantulas?

By the gods! That
would kill an aurochs!
I see! Two eyes of newt and three toes of frog!

You aren't my replace-
ment, are you? Damn...

Don't ever turn your
back on a beastie, hear?

Yes, but we must first
remove the stagnation.

I wouldn't put
it past this lot.

The city's alive
once again!
All hail the sultana!
And I said no!

I want another
honey cake!

You don't think some-
one stole it, do you?
Plaza secure!

Where do you
want these, ma'am?

Start any trouble, and
I'll see you rot in the
oubliettes for eternity.

If it's gil you want,
come stick your hands
in me pockets!
Shake it, ladies!
Shall we be going, then?
As you command.
A thousand apologies, sir.
You watch yourself now!

BlOoD! MaImInG! FuN
fOr YoUnG☆aNd☆OlD!

Just toss it with
the rest of the rubbish.

I kill you and
make you die!

If I don't die of
laughter first!

Don't you go bringing
any of that rabble in here.

It's best you keep
one eye on your purse.

A hundred gil
on the Hellsguard!
未使用：荒：会話00104
Ahahahaha!

You damn near pulled
me arm straight out of
its socket!
Mwahahaha!
Mwaha!

Do not take your
eyes off your victim!

There is but one thing
you must remember
when channeling the dark!

This'll teach that
whoreson to cozen me!

I could have sworn I
set my rod down here.

I heard they're plotting
an attempt on the
sultana's life!

What thaumaturgy
destroys...
...thaumaturgy creates!

They'll never know
what hit them! Tee hee!

I'll cast the Fire spell
once they've retired
to their chambers!
Hyah! Hyah! Hyah!

Removing the hunt from
battle... How brutish.

But I followed the
designs to the letter...

Ain't naught fer ye here
but a knife in the gut.

No. None of these will
do. They're all too old.
早く行きましょう…
Alms for the poor!

Please, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>milady<Else/>milord</If>.
I cannot even walk.

Distant worlds together,
miracles from realms
beyond...♪

One, and two, and
three, and four, and...
What ever are you implying!?

Might it feel tight
around the middle?

I had it embroidered
with Thavnairian silk.
Oh, how wonderful!

The Weavers' Guild is
this way, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>ma'am<Else/>sir</If>.

You 'old your drink
'bout as good as a Lala.
Did I...win...?

Won't know what I'm
lookin' for till I find it.

Do you even know
what we're looking for?

I's a sack o' coin with
yer name on it, love.

Jusslemme die
herein peece... Ulp!
What about gold chains?

I'll never finish
this, will I?

Would you mind
stepping back?
WeLcOmmmm★※～

Keep your shields up!
Again!

This is the entrance
to the hypogeum.

I should have joined
the Weavers' Guild...
Did you even try to hit him!?

We have seats so close,
you can smell the action!

So this is the world-
famous Coliseum...

Bubble, bubble, toil
and...and...and bubble?

Omit even one of the
ingredients, and the
results would be fatal.

But there must
be a way! There must!

No manner of alchemy
can bring her back, Father.

When, exactly, did
these episodes begin?

It's my son. He's been
having terrible night fits.

You're surely not
serious...are you!?

If I cannot talk my way
into his heart, I'll poison
my way into it!

What was it we were
searching for again?

What business would
Her Grace have
with the likes of you?

If you ask me, I say
to the hells with them!

Might ye spare a poor
man some coin, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>?

What ever do you have
in that pot? It smells
absolutely heavenly!
ざまぁみろ！
あ？　お前はすっこんでろ！
テメーは関係ねぇんだよ
未使用
ハッ、隊長殿！

I hear ore yields have
increased twofold...but
so have miner deaths.

Times are harsh.
A man'll work twenty
bells straight if it
means food in his belly.
Perhaps. If they had a little more incentive.
未使用

Can your men not
move any faster?
未使用

Was it the markets? Or
the Goldsmiths' Guild?
Or maybe Vesper Bay?

7...8...9... Thal's balls!
It must be those
damn rat-thieves again!
未使用

Another adventurer?
You may pass.
未使用

I wonder if they'd
notice if I slipped one
of these under my tunic.

Enemies on the
western front!
Drink up, my dears!

And so I sliced it off
and tossed it in the lake!

All's clear on
the western front.

Jussone more cupp,
littlemann! Hic!

Get off your drunken
arse and make ready!

What do you say,
friend? Ten gil a pull!

Some of Stonesthrow's
extra-special stew, sir!

If it needs killin', I'm yer
man. Fer a price, that is.

You got any work? I'm
quite handy with an axe.
Just leave me be...

Heh heh. He won't
be needin' this.
未使用
So...hungry...
I wasn't asking you...

Were there no better
seats? I can't see a thing!

Hah! You couldn't afford
me, you poxy-arsed fool.

WeLcOmE★tO★tHe
GoLdSmItHs'★gUiLd!

Don't these contrap-
tions ever blink!?

The Hustings Strip
lies above.

What other choice
do we have?

The East Aldenard
Trading Company!? Never!

You must put past
differences aside.

And she ran out of the
lord's chambers wearing
naught but her knickers!

That new maidservant!?
No! Truly?

I cannot return home.
Not when I'm so close!

Be careful not to over-
stimulate the reagents!

Can we not
use this water?
But it'll cost you!

Might be we
could find you one...
I'm looking to buy a ruby...a large ruby.

It's your turn to
make the rounds!
Twelve be good! No man deserves that fate.
This ale reeks of rat!

Why don't we wait out
here a moment longer?

Have mercy, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>milady<Else/>milord</If>.
Some somnus's all I ask.
\\<cough> \\<cough>

Have a look, good <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lady<Else/>sir</If>!
You won't regret it!

Twenty gil, and I'll
do whatever you want.
未使用

And be some fat
merchant's slave?
I'd rather starve!

I hear patrons pay good
coin for live-in maids.
未使用

Mind the tracks, lest
you be crushed by the
iron beast.

Where'd you want this
again? I haven't all day.

Please! My son...he
hasn't eaten in two days.
未使用

Tessme s'pply reggarly
t'ssure quality, I do. Hic!

Me thigh muscles are
right sore. How 'bout
ye help loosen 'em up?

We've everything you
didn't think you needed!

Hm? Can I, uh, interest
you in a... Oh, never mind...
未使用

How about I help loosen
them teeth from that
filthy gob o' yours?

Welcome to Ul'dah.
I hope you brought a
fat purse.

Don't try anything, or I'll
skin ye and throw the
rest in our cookpots.
\\<grunt>

Botch the synthesis
again, did you?

Is it skins you seek?
Or perhaps silks?

Four found dead on
Pearl Lane! Accident or
foul play!? Read it here!
I told you, I'm not your mummy!
Mummy, I'm tired!
This heat is unbearable!

Bring me your best
bottle of sour red!

And a man cannot
work with his throat dry.

What'd I ever do to get
stuck with slag duty?

Got caught fondlin' the
foreman's daughter is
what you did.
未使用

Seven hells! You think
the boys could've filled
this crate any fuller!?

Yes, but what of its
purity? I won't be had twice.

'Tis the largest chunk of
silver ore you've seen.

(If you call river water
and rat pelts “stew.”)
未使用：荒：会話00251
未使用

And I took off its head
with one fell swing!

Hahaha! I'd hate
to be that squirrel.
未使用

My turn!?
I just got back!
未使用

Only 5,000 more and
you'll break my record!

I ain't been so hungry
since...since yesterday!
未使用
Die, fiery fiend!

If only all your victims
were this...stationary.

I came as quickly
as I could, sir!

I don't pay you to rest,
boy! Back on your feet!

I hear there's good coin
to be made selling relics
from the Footfalls.

But they say that
place is cursed!

If you don't know where
you are, you shouldn't
be here, traveler.
Move along.
I say we go east!
I say we go west!
未使用

Stand clear of the gate,
or you'll find yourself
under a chocobo's talons.

One day, Ul'dah.
One day.

Follow the Sunway
south to the Silver
Bazaar, north to Horizon.
Everything must go!

Four coffers, each
containing 63 ponzes
of ore... Carry the one...

Don't happen to have
a hot pie on you, do you?

The Royal Sunway
is clear!
未使用480
未使用481
未使用482

I do not recall ordering
this many Lalafellin lentils!

Prices won't be this
low again until the
Eighth Astral Era!
ホントかよ？
未使用486
未使用487
今です！　今出ました！
未使用489

I shouldn't have had that
sixth bottle of sour red!
All appears to be in order.
未使用492
未使用493

I spied the old miller
taking down his tent.

He'll be the third to
leave in as many days!
Nothin' fer sale here.

…店はやってないぜ
